Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Nelson Valdes Jr
Reviews.Content: Good product and they complied with the sale the phone is new in the box I have no issues at all

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Dylan
Reviews.Content: phone came good, everything worked good, minor scratches and scuffs but works good overall so im happy with it yeah

Reviews.Title: Unusable
Reviews.Author: HC
Reviews.Content: Unable to use phone.  Tried to charge all night, but would not charge at all.  Had to return it and get another one.
